a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The total fertility rate summarizes the total number of births a woman would have, if she experienced the birth
rates seen in women of each age group in one particular year across her childbearing years. Estimates are shown
with projections until 2100, based on the UN medium scenario.
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024)
